name: Arbitrum Tap Tap Game
subtitle: Tap to earn points and mint NFTs on Arbitrum
description: Experience the future of Web3 gaming! Tap the Arbitrum logo to earn points, unlock NFT minting at milestones, and explore popular memecoins. Built as a Farcaster Mini App with seamless blockchain integration.
tagline: Tap, Earn & Mint NFTs on Arbitrum
ogTitle: Arbitrum Tap Tap Game - Web3 Gaming Experience
ogDescription: Tap the Arbitrum logo to earn points and unlock NFT minting opportunities. Explore popular memecoins and experience the future of blockchain gaming.
